title.narrative: Regional Demonstration Project for Coordinated Management of ODS and POPs Disposal in the Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Armenia

description.narrative: Regional Demonstration Project for Coordinated Management of ODS and POPs Disposal in Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Armenia - The project will demonstrate environmentally sound collection and destruction of Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) and Ozone Depleting Substances (ODS) in Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Armenia, by addressing multi focal areas, and therefore, it will assist the countries involved in meeting their obligations under the Stockholm Convention and the Montreal Protocol.
